data.actual_result: You will see a "New unreads" button although you muted the category and collapsed it.
data.expected_result: There shouldn't be a "New unreads" button because you've muted the category.
data.short_description: "New unreads" button is shown for channels of a muted category
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute a category - Get a new message in any channel of the muted category - Scroll up a bit in your server to make sure that this channel is out of sight
